body.p:
Louisville Oct 25th /65
To his Excellency
Governor Bramlett

With an overflowing heart of gratitude, I wish to say, that your Christ-like act of pardon, saved both mother & son The former was sick, nigh unto death, & many persons believe that no earthly means else, could have saved her
Shurely such just acts of mercy, will make peaceful that life, now hallowed by the prayers of relieved hearts!

With highest esteem, I am
Your most obliged
Mrs C. G. Sadd
